item.title: Rubbish along the street on daily basis, including broken bottles, beer bottles, dumped litter, cans, food waste etc. I'm cleaning out rubbish daily outside of my property but it's neverending. That should be arranged by Lambeth Council. Sometimes walk along Chantrey Road, Dalyell Road towards the Brixton Station is simply horrible with rubbish all over the place. How much from my council tax goes to street cleansing? I've not seen any cleaning activity for a long long time., 23rd December
item.description:
Rubbish along the street on daily basis, including broken bottles, beer bottles, dumped litter, cans, food waste etc. I'm cleaning out rubbish daily outside of my property but it's neverending. That should be arranged by Lambeth Council. Sometimes walk along Chantrey Road, Dalyell Road towards the Brixton Station is simply horrible with rubbish all over the place. How much from my council tax goes to street cleansing? I've not seen any cleaning activity for a long long time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chantrey Road, Brixton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light diffuser., 23rd December
item.description:
